column5: Just kidding...no GPS.  But serious folks after reading all the Bull about posting so many pics of CC's steelies.....who cares. This is what I love about the board.....99% of the time there is no Bull  and 99% of the time everyone is here to help out others.  After all......I spend so much time on this board because the people are so friendly and don't mind sharing their stories and pics......that's what make OFC so special.  I never complain about anything while I'm one this board....but it's really pisses me off so see a stranger come on and attack our fellow members......anyways that's my rant for today.  Well today was my 33rd birthday and a very good friend of mind went to a local eastern trib and caught a few fish.....so here's the pics.  And yes there are some background shots as well......if you can figure out which creek and the exact spot......then good for you and I hope we can share the hole tomorrow.......cheers.  By the way....I was using 6lb P-Line flurocarbon and a #8 Diachi hook with orange and green brown roe.  Here's my buddy with a nice fish     Bad hold on this guy....opps.     When we were about to leave...this guy come out for a little photo session.    Jason
Awesome report, photos and attitude Basskicker. And happy birthday...
What a way to spend your birthday, nice report man. And happy Birthday

NIce pics and great job.....( another guy catching fish but me ...boo hoo....lol ) If yer at the same spot tomorrow ( i think I know it) bring a apple for that there rodent.... he might not take from your hands but Im sure he would appreciate it!! Good job on the steelie
Happy birthday!!!  Great day of steelheading there!  Congrats on both accounts.  Awesome pics and info shared in your post.  Thanks a million!
NICE JOB GUYS AND HAPPY BDAY
Happy Birthday.  Beauty Fish and Beauty photos.  Joey
Great pic's, thanks for the report...
Happy birthday and nice report. By the way if you can figure out the spot from those pictures than you already know where it is.
Looks like you had yourself a great Birthday.  Congrats and thanks your sharing your day with us.
Cannot think of a better way to spend a birthday, wtg Basskicker.

Thanks guys......it was a great way to celebrate B-day with a good friend of mind....thanks if your reading this. Thinking about heading down to the creek this afternoon....but that wind is just howling out of the north. Jason
Nice job!!! Happy Bday!! Good job braven that weather, cause man it looks cold. I think thats the only thing keepin me in. Damm winds!!!
Great report! Thanks for posting.  ehg
Happy Birthday!  The smiles in your pictures say it all!  Jen
Well a belated happy birthday.  The pics say you had a great one!
WTG on the steelies and report!  Happy Belated birthday, sorry, I didn't come across this thread earlier.  HF
